CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: These results demonstrate that the 4,9bis(2-ethylhexyloxy)naphtho [1,2-b:5,6-b′]dithiophene is a promising versatile core unit for developing high - performance OFETs and polymer solar cells.

Let's think step by step.

Sure! Here are the "Material Name" entities in the paragraph:

1. 4,9bis(2-ethylhexyloxy)naphtho[1,2-b:5,6-b′]dithiophene

This is the name of the material being studied in the paragraph, which is a type of organic semiconductor.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

Of course! Here are the entities in the paragraph that refer to the "Material Name":

1. 4,9bis(2-ethylhexyloxy)naphtho[1,2-b:5,6-b′]dithiophene

These are the only entities in the paragraph that clearly refer to the "Material Name".

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Certainly! Here are the valid entities in the paragraph that refer to the "Material Name":

| Material Name |
| --- |
| 4,9bis(2-ethylhexyloxy)naphtho[1,2-b:5,6-b′]dithiophene |

I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any further questions.

2. performance - This is a property of the 4,9bis(2-ethylhexyloxy)naphtho[1,2-b:5,6-b′]dithiophene, which is being measured in the context of the study.

So, the entities that refer to the value of material properties in the paragraph are:
